title: ACML 2020 Workshop on Machine Learning in Thailand
participationStr: The MLIT 2020 will be a virtual event where everyone is welcome to participate. There is no registration or participation fee. We will use Zoom as our online platform for all the live sessions. The Zoom link to join will be posted on the website. In the event where the capacity to join the live Zoom session is reached, we will provide a link to join a Youtube or Facebook livestream.
